photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

group.description: The group the guest belongs to (e.g., Bride's Family, Friends).

BudgetItem.title: Budget Item
BudgetItem.description: Represents an item in the wedding budget.

budget.description: The allocated budget for this category.

spent.description: The amount spent in this category.

RegistryItem.title: Registry Item
RegistryItem.description: Represents an item in the wedding registry.

title.description: The title of the registry item.

store.description: The store where the item can be purchased.

imageId.description: The ID of the placeholder image for the item.

purchased.description: Whether the item has been purchased.

WeddingWebsite.title: Wedding Website
WeddingWebsite.description: Stores the configuration for a user's wedding website.

weddingDate.description: The date and time of the wedding.

welcomeMessage.description: A welcome message for the guests.

vanityUrl.description: The custom vanity URL for the website.

templateId.description: The ID of the chosen website template.

/users/{userId}/guests/{guestId}.description: Stores the guest list for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/budgetItems/{itemId}.description: Stores budget items for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/registryItems/{itemId}.description: Stores registry items for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/website/details.description: Stores the details for a user's single wedding website.
